headline: CoreWeave Stock Climbs on Meta Deal. Why Two Is Better Than One.
summary: CoreWeave  stock surged in early trading Tuesday after the artificial-intelligence cloud service provider unveiled an up to $14.2 billion deal with  Meta Platforms  a deal that adds another large revenue customer to its roster of clients.  In a Form 8-K filed Tuesday with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the company confirmed it had entered into a new order agreement with Meta, which guarantees CoreWeave will provide Meta access to cloud computing capacity.  Meta will pay up to $14.2 billion through Dec. 14, 2031, with the option to “materially expand” its commitment through 2032 for additional cloud computing capacity, CoreWeave said.

raw.headline: CoreWeave Stock Climbs on Meta Deal. Why Two Is Better Than One.
raw.summary: CoreWeave  stock surged in early trading Tuesday after the artificial-intelligence cloud service provider unveiled an up to $14.2 billion deal with  Meta Platforms  a deal that adds another large revenue customer to its roster of clients.  In a Form 8-K filed Tuesday with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the company confirmed it had entered into a new order agreement with Meta, which guarantees CoreWeave will provide Meta access to cloud computing capacity.  Meta will pay up to $14.2 billion through Dec. 14, 2031, with the option to “materially expand” its commitment through 2032 for additional cloud computing capacity, CoreWeave said.

headline: Tato Raises $5M to Fix ERP Implementations with AI-Native Platform
summary: Tato, the AI-native project platform purpose-built for system integrators, today announced a $5 million Seed round led by Ridge Ventures, with participation from Myriad Venture Partners, Betaworks, RRE Ventures, and others. The funding will be used to scale the team as it continues to fix implementation problems that have crippled digital transformation for decades.

headline: Grafana Labs Surpasses $400M ARR and 7,000 Customers, Gains New Investors to Accelerate Global Expansion
summary: NEW YORK, September 30, 2025--Grafana Labs, the company behind the open observability cloud, today announced the completion of a secondary transaction led by Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan, with participation from Sapphire Ventures and Tiger Global. Existing investors Lightspeed Venture Partners, GIC, Coatue, Sequoia Capital, CapitalG, and Lead Edge Capital also took part.

headline: Onapsis Partners with Microsoft to Boost Enterprise Defense with End-to-End SAP Security Monitoring
summary: BOSTON, September 30, 2025--Onapsis, a global leader in SAP cybersecurity and compliance, today announced the launch of a new integration between its flagship Onapsis Defend threat monitoring product and Microsoft Sentinel Solution for SAP, based on Microsoft’s AI-powered cloud-native Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) platform. The integration provides security operations centers (SOC) with unified visibility and threat detection and response capabilities for SAP security events.

raw.headline: Onapsis Partners with Microsoft to Boost Enterprise Defense with End-to-End SAP Security Monitoring
raw.summary: BOSTON, September 30, 2025--Onapsis, a global leader in SAP cybersecurity and compliance, today announced the launch of a new integration between its flagship Onapsis Defend threat monitoring product and Microsoft Sentinel Solution for SAP, based on Microsoft’s AI-powered cloud-native Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) platform. The integration provides security operations centers (SOC) with unified visibility and threat detection and response capabilities for SAP security events.

headline: Contact Center Software Market Industry Trends and Global Forecasts to 2035: From Cisco to Microsoft - Contact Center Software Market Set for Major Growth Through 2035
summary: The contact center software market offers opportunities through global expansion, AI-enhanced solutions like chatbots and analytics, cloud-based deployments, and rising SME adoption. Growth is fueled by demand for efficient, omnichannel customer service solutions, particularly in Asia and the BFSI sector.
